scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-lambda-nodejs && npm run install-lambda-python
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-lambda-nodejs && npm run deploy-lambda-python && npm run deploy-rds
scripts.deploy-lambda-nodejs: cd lambda-nodejs && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --aws-profile highsugar
scripts.deploy-lambda-python: cd lambda-python && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --aws-profile highsugar
scripts.deploy-rds: cd rds && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --aws-profile highsugar
